actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for a reduction in individual income tax rates.
short_title: Income Tax Reduction and Economic Growth Act of 1991

summary.text: Income Tax Reduction and Economic Growth Act of 1991 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce the tax rate on individuals. Phases in such rate reductions beginning in 1992 through 1996. Modifies the withholding tables to reflect such reductions.

titles.title: Income Tax Reduction and Economic Growth Act of 1991
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for a reduction in individual income tax rates.
